long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Web Activity Time Tracker keeps track of how you spend time on the web and presents the stats in a useful and intuitive way.

Take control of your online time with our Chrome extension! Track and limit your usage on any website, helping you stay productive and focused.

Stay focused and maximize your productivity. Whether you're managing work projects, studying for exams, or simply want to understand your browsing habits better, this tool is your go-to companion.

âœ¦ What is Web Activity Time Tracker?

Web Activity Time Tracker is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you monitor and optimize your online productivity. Effortlessly track the time you spend on each website, set goals, and get detailed reports to boost efficiency and focus. With a sleek, user-friendly interface and real-time insights, this tool empowers you to make the most of your web browsing. Stay on top of your online habits and achieve your productivity goals with ease!

Web Activity Time Tracker is ad-free and open-source extension. You can set a daily visit limit for sites and block it after the expiration of the limit. 

Alternate work and rest times with Pomodoro Mode.

Key Features:

âœ… Real-Time Tracking: Get instant insights into the time spent on each website you visit.
âœ… Daily and Hourly Reports: Receive summary reports that highlight your browsing habits and patterns. Comparison of time by day
âœ… Limit and Block Distracting Websites: Set daily time limits for specific websites to help you stay focused.
âœ… Usage Statistics.  Effortlessly monitor the time you spend on different websites.
âœ… Notifications for Websites and daily summary notification. Set goals and receive notifications to stay on track.
âœ… Pomodoro Mode
âœ… Track files in the browser, including .pdf, .png, .json and so on
âœ… Export Data to CSV
âœ… Privacy Focused: Your data is secure; we donâ€™t share your browsing information.

Web Activity Time Tracker helps you:

ğŸ§© Stay focused
ğŸ§  Understand how you use the internet
ğŸ‘€ Reduce distraction
ğŸ›‘ Overcome web addiction
â±ï¸ Self-control
ğŸ’¯ Boost productivity
ğŸš€ Increase your digital wellbeing
ğŸ’ª Reduce wasted time

Take control of your online habits and make every minute count with Web Activity Time Tracker. 

Extension doesn't track any information about you and does not send data anywhere. Chrome Local Storage is used to save your usage data in a simple format.

You can issue me on https://github.com/Stigmatoz/web-activity-time-tracker/issues
long.de:

Web Activity Time Tracker ist eine werbefreie und Open-Source-Erweiterung. Sie verfolgt, wie viel Zeit Sie im Internet verbringen und stellt die Statistiken auf nÃ¼tzliche und intuitive Weise dar. Sie kÃ¶nnen ein tÃ¤gliches Besuchslimit fÃ¼r Websites festlegen und diese nach Ablauf des Limits blockieren. 

Wechseln Sie Arbeits- und Ruhezeiten mit dem Pomodoro-Modus ab.

Web Activity Time Tracker hilft Ihnen:

Ãœbernehmen Sie die Kontrolle Ã¼ber Ihre Online-Gewohnheiten und lassen Sie jede Minute zÃ¤hlen - mit Web Activity Time Tracker. 

Die Erweiterung verfolgt keine Informationen Ã¼ber Sie und sendet keine Daten an Dritte. Chrome Local Storage wird verwendet, um Ihre Nutzungsdaten in einem einfachen Format zu speichern.

long.es:
Mantente concentrado y maximiza tu productividad con la extensiÃ³n de Chrome Web Activity Time Tracker. Tanto si estÃ¡s gestionando proyectos de trabajo, estudiando para exÃ¡menes o simplemente quieres entender mejor tus hÃ¡bitos de navegaciÃ³n, esta herramienta es tu compaÃ±era de viaje.

âœ¦ Â¿QuÃ© es Web Activity Time Tracker?

Web Activity Time Tracker es una extensiÃ³n libre de publicidad y de cÃ³digo abierto. Realiza un seguimiento del tiempo que pasas en la web y presenta las estadÃ­sticas de forma Ãºtil e intuitiva. Puedes establecer un lÃ­mite diario de visitas a sitios y bloquearlos una vez expirado el lÃ­mite. 

Alterna los tiempos de trabajo y descanso con el Modo Pomodoro.

â­ CaracterÃ­sticas de la extensiÃ³n: â­

âœ… Modo Pomodoro
âœ… Tiempo total dedicado a navegar hoy, por dÃ­as y por horas.
âœ… EstadÃ­sticas de uso
âœ… ComparaciÃ³n del tiempo por dÃ­as
âœ… Bloquear los sitios web que distraen la atenciÃ³n
âœ… Notificaciones de sitios web y notificaciÃ³n de resumen diario
âœ… Seguimiento de archivos en el navegador, incluidos .pdf, .png, .json, etc.
âœ… Exportar datos a CSV

Web Activity Time Tracker le ayuda a:
ğŸ§© Mantener la concentraciÃ³n
ğŸ§  Entender cÃ³mo utilizas Internet
ğŸ‘€ Reducir las distracciones
ğŸ›‘ Superar la adicciÃ³n a Internet
â±ï¸ Autocontrol
ğŸ’¯ Aumentar la productividad
ğŸš€ Aumentar tu bienestar digital
ğŸ’ª Reducir la pÃ©rdida de tiempo

Toma el control de tus hÃ¡bitos online y haz que cada minuto cuente con Web Activity Time Tracker. 

La extensiÃ³n no rastrea ninguna informaciÃ³n sobre ti y no envÃ­a datos a ninguna parte. Chrome Local Storage se utiliza para guardar tus datos de uso en un formato sencillo.

Puedes enviarme un mensaje a https://github.com/Stigmatoz/web-activity-time-tracker/issues
